note.p: Dental surgeon. Educated at St Bartholemew’s Hospital; lecturer on dental surgery, 1867–84. Emigrated to New Zealand, 1884, but returned to England in 1890; elected a governor of St Bartholemew’s. Practised in Savile Row where he was joined by Francis Ewbank and John Ackery. Had a special interest in anaesthesia in dental surgery.
